CSS Helper Classes

Classes to DRY and Scale your CSS

Padding

                      .p-0 {
                          padding: 0 !important;
                      }
                      .p-5 {
                          padding: 5px !important;
                      }
                      .p-10 {

Image Sizes

                          width: 30px;
                          height: 30px;
                      }

                          height: 35px;
                      }
